Python

Java

Copy

```
curl --request DELETE \
  --url https://app.chatwoot.com/api/v1/accounts/{account_id}/contacts/{id} \
  --header 'api_access_token: <api-key>'
```

401

#### Authorizations

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/delete-contact#authorization-api-access-token)

api\_access\_token

string

header

required

This token can be obtained by visiting the profile page or via rails console. Provides access to endpoints based on the user permissions levels. This token can be saved by an external system when user is created via API, to perform activities on behalf of the user.

#### Path Parameters

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/delete-contact#parameter-account-id)

account\_id

integer

required

The numeric ID of the account

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/delete-contact#parameter-id)

id

number

required

ID of the contact

#### Response

200

200401404

Success
